title: Play Button Not Working (grayed out periodically?)
body:
Occasionally on launch, as well as periodically when the client is open and idling, my Play button in the upper-right corner will gray out, not allowing me to click it.  There's no warning, no notices, it just does it on it's own.  Periodically it will return to normal, and then go back to being gray again.  I've found no fix for this other than restarting the client.

Can someone please help or explain what the issue is, or, you know, fix it?  Shit's annoying.

Client Version: V7.6-4115265.4140304

replies.body:
I like to sometimes refer to the play button as your "matchmaking portal". If your network loses it's connection to that portal, it won't be able to connect you to any games so the play button will no longer work. Whenever it grays out, it's the clients way of letting you know that it can't talk with our servers well enough to play a game. 

Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some ways you can get a more stable connection with our servers.
Also submitted this to the Report a Bug thingy.
